entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow adding `scoped` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #62340
    17.4
  • Remove `ref scoped` #62338
    17.4

Closed

  • Visual Basic Move Static Members: Refactoring one of multiple fields incorrectly formats whitespace #62283
  • Add CodeQualityOption<T> and CodeQualityOptions to Workspaces layer #31225
    Backlog
  • Why doesn't this code work? #62342

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify diagnostics in parsing tests #62341
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove LangVer check from extended nameof binding #62339
    Area-Compilers
  • Synch handlers3 #62337
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Ensure elastic trivia for reusable syntax in field generator #62346
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62345
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix typos in the incremental generators doc #62343
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62351
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62350
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62349
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62348
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #62347
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Introduce variable rvalue fix #45918
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not strip underscore if the result name will be invalid #62290
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Address prototype comments in file types branch #62335
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unneeded LocalizableStringWithArguments #62150
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Prefix 'unmerged changes' with 'TODO' #62319
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
